examples: Age and experience mellowed him over the years

definitions.text: become more relaxed, easygoing, or genial

examples: These apples need to mellow a bit more

definitions.text: having a full and pleasing flavor through proper aging
having attained to kindliness or gentleness through age and experience
having attained to kindliness or gentleness through age and experience
slightly and pleasantly intoxicated from alcohol or a drug (especially marijuana)
